page.title: 14Iron Works
page.content: {Local History. }For three generations the Iron Works have been in the same family.The anvil now used came from the original Forge and Smithy.They have many antique firebacks,some dating from the fifteenth and sixtenth century. {Art and Craft.}Firebacks and ornaments can be made to traditional designs,or to the buyers' own specifications.Individual weathervane motifs are designed by the owner and welded to the traditional weathervane shape. {Trade. }The Iron Works is situated on the main A21 road and is a good place for passing motorists to buy or browse {Tourism. }Tourists come to see the museum which has many old agricultural tools and machines,as well as general items of interest from days gone by. Individual
